attributes.action: Reform Child Maintenance Laws to Close Loopholes  used by Non-Resident Parents
attributes.background: I want the government to reform the Child Maintenance Service by closing loopholes that let parents avoid paying. Support should reflect the real cost of raising a child, not just income. There must be minimum contributions, proper enforcement, and asset checks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717395
